Package source.application

Class CampManager

java.lang.Object
source.application.CampManager
public class CampManager extends Object
CampsManager serve as a proxy between students and camps; students only know the camp name and need to go through here to actually access the camp objects.

    • addParticipantToCamp

      public static void addParticipantToCamp(Student student, String campName, boolean committeeRole)
      Add student to a camp, and create the corresponding role under student.

      This method checks:

      1) camp is set to visible

      2) student's faculty belongs to the user group of the camp

      3) student has no clash in dates (as well as not already signed up for this camp)

      4) registration deadline has not pass yet

      5) camp still has slots left

      6) student did not withdraw from this camp before

      Corresponding exception will be thrown if there is any error. No exceptions means student is sucessfully registered.

      Parameters:
      campName - Name of the camp.
      committeeRole - True for committee, false for attendee.
      Throws:
      CampNotFoundException - If camp name provided is invalid, camp is deleted, or camp is set to unvisible.
      InvalidUserGroupException
      DateClashException
      DeadlineOverException
      CampFullException
      WithdrawnException

    • removeParticipantFromCamp

      public static boolean removeParticipantFromCamp(Student student, String campName)
      Withdraw student from a camp, and remove the corresponding role under student.

      This method checks if student is actually an attendee of the camp.

      Parameters:
      campName -
      Returns:
      True if sucessfully withdrawn, false if student is not attending the camp as attendee in the first place.
      Throws:
      CampNotFoundException

    • viewOpenCamps

      public static void viewOpenCamps(Student student)
      Print out a list of camps that the student can register (only camp information).

      This method checks:

      1) camp's user group is NTU or matches student's faculty.

      2) camp's visibility is set to on.

      3) camp is active (not deleted).

      Parameters:
      student - The student who wish to view the open camps.

    • viewAllCamps

      public static void viewAllCamps(Staff staff)
      Print out a list of all camps (detailed camp info).
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff who wish to view all the camps.

    • recordNewCamp

      public static void recordNewCamp(Staff staff, Camp camp)
      After a staff create a new camp, call this method to record the camp in the static camps ArrayList
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff who wish to record the camp after creating it.
      camp - The newly created camp to record.
